One thing about the shield weapons: those are kinda moding since this is Cyberwolf's base, and its up to him to say whether they pass or not. So if he says no, we'll need to start back a bit or something.

Also, forget my last post with Killfest. Seems I was confused again. (Final exams take alot out of a person)


::Killfest/Neody::

Killfest follows Drillbit through, firing his missile launcher at the Trainer base before a blast hits the ground next to him, sending him flying to the side. He regains balance, looking up and seeing a ship. He hears Cygnar's transmission, but doesn't move to retreat yet, firing another missile at the base.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Neody's organic pods warn him of the detonating bombs before they are destroyed by them, the bot running back from the base. A bomb explodes behind him, sending him flying forward, landing on his face.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "Lets go Killfest!"
> He runs through the tunnel catching up with Cygnar. He comes out the
> other side, opening fire on the nearest Trainer. His massive gattaling
> gun blazing.
